00044 template<typename T, typename U> Map<T, U>::Map() {
00045 _table = NULL;
00046 _size = 0;

00049 template<typename T, typename U> Map<T, U>::~Map() {
00050         if(_table != NULL) {
00051         delete[] _table;        
00052         }
00053         _table = NULL;
00054         _size = 0;
00055 }

00057 template<typename T, typename U> Map<T, U>& Map<T, U>::insert(T key, U value) {
00058         int inTab = 0;
00059         if(_table != NULL) {
00060                 for(int i = 0; i < _size; i++) {
00061                         if (_table[i].key == key) {
00062                         _table[i].value = value;
00063                         inTab = 1;
00064                         break;
00065                         }
00066                 }
00067         }
00068         if(inTab == 0) {
00069         int newSize = _size+1;
00070         MapEntry<T, U>* newTable = NULL;
00071         newTable = new MapEntry<T, U>[newSize];
00072         for(int i = 0; i < _size; i++) {
00073         newTable[i] = _table[i];        
00074         }
00075         newTable[newSize-1].key = key;
00076         newTable[newSize-1].value = value;
00077         delete[] _table;
00078         _table = newTable;
00079         _size = newSize;
00080         }
00081         return *this;
00082 }

00084 template<typename T, typename U> void Map<T, U>::print(std::string str) {
00085         for(int i = 0; i < _size; i++) {
00086                 std::cout << str << " k: " << _table[i].key << " v: " << _table[i].value << std::endl;  
00087         }
00088 }

00090 template<typename T, typename U> U& Map<T, U>::operator[](T key) {
00091         int tabIdx = -1;
00092         if(_table != NULL) {
00093                 for(int i = 0; i < _size; i++) {
00094                         if (_table[i].key == key) {
00095                         tabIdx = i;
00096                         break;
00097                         }
00098                 }
00099                 if(tabIdx != -1) {
00100                         return _table[tabIdx].value;

00102         int newSize = _size+1;

00104         newTable = new MapEntry<T, U>[newSize];

00111         _size = newSize;

00129 template<typename T, typename U> U Map<T, U>::operator[](T key) const {

00148 template<typename T, typename U> int Map<T, U>::contains(T key) const {
